oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-09-03 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 3, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performers Stuart Hamblen and Martha Carson, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carl Smith; Rod Brasfield; Martha Carson; Stuart Hamblen; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Harvey's commercial -- Grant Turner introduces Carl Smith -- Don't Tease Me (Carl Smith) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Martha Carson and Stuart Hamblen -- Lord I Can't Come Now (Martha Carson, Stuart Hamblen) -- Carl Smith talks -- Wait A Little Longer Please Jesus (Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert jingle (Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Del Wood -- Smoky Mountain Polka (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Sholes, Stephen Henry; Hamblen, Stuart, 1908-1989; Carson, Martha
